未来是可穿戴的：通过便携式光谱仪促进人类健康在圣地亚哥 2024 年 Pittcon 大会上进行的采访中，我们采访了 Richard Crocombe，讲述了他在光谱学领域的历程，重点关注了便携式光谱仪的发展及其在可穿戴健康和健身技术方面的变革潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/The-Future-is-Wearable-Advancing-Human-Health-Through-Portable-Spectroscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/The-Future-is-Wearable-Advancing-Human-Health-Through-Portable-Spectroscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b56f39-c695-4e53-a3c8-56036587cbbe Thu, 18 Jul 2024 11:01:00 -0400 The Future is Wearable: Advancing Human Health Through Portable Spectroscopy
用于早期痴呆症预测的可靠人工智能引导标记研究人员使用机器学习技术来开发和测试预测预后模型，以利用真实世界的患者数据及早预测痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/A-reliable-artificial-intelligence-guided-marker-for-early-dementia-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/A-reliable-artificial-intelligence-guided-marker-for-early-dementia-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dadfa3f-cb94-4eac-8eaf-47a3060b534b Thu, 18 Jul 2024 09:51:00 -0400 A reliable artificial intelligence-guided marker for early dementia prediction

普通血液稀释剂可以重新用作眼镜蛇毒液的廉价解毒剂悉尼大学和利物浦热带医学院的科学家有了一项了不起的发现：常用的血液稀释剂肝素可以重新用作眼镜蛇毒液的廉价解毒剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Common-blood-thinner-can-be-re Purposed-as-an-inexpective-antidote-for-cobra-venom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Common-blood-thinner-can-be-re Purposed-as-an-inexpective-antidote-for-cobra-venom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b15eee3a-093a-44ee-b355-d1232db6ff3b Thu, 18 Jul 2024 08:34:58 -0400 Common blood thinner can be repurposed as an inexpensive antidote for cobra venom
